15211.content:
The gloves worked well at helping Daniel grip the steering wheel. They also protected his hands if the wheel got too hot or too cold. Daniel honestly did not think he would ever lock himself out so he wasn't sure how he would test these gloves. But sure enough, the very next place he parked, he locked himself out of his car.

The parking lot was crowded and Daniel had to park far from any building. It was the perfect time to test the gloves. He put them on and went to touch his car but before he even knew he had touched it, every clasp around him opened including his zippers and shoelaces. His pants fell and as he tried to pull them up, he tripped tangling his feet in his pants and shoelaces. He couldn't even stand up because his feet were practically tied together.

The parking lot was a wide-open, flat place with only cars to hide behind. Many people passed him on the way to or from their vehicles.

info.brief_description: Customers lose more than just money after visiting a shady antique store.
info.description:
Welcome to Everything Laid Bare Occult and Antiques, a store of much mystery and intrigue. Strange wonders line the shelves: jewels, potions, wands, relics and more. Customers leave the store with these magical artifacts and find that, in time, the cost was far greater than just bills and coins. One day, while walking through the city, a certain young customer finds the store, and is exposed by the magic of whatever they may have purchased.

Daniel is a 19 year old boy, 5’8” with blond hair. He has a slim build, and is endowed a slightly more than most men at 8”. He is skeptic of magic, and walks into the store hoping to prove it a hoax. He finds himself proven wrong, and finds himself having trouble keeping his clothes on.

Vanessa is 20 years old girl, 5’5” with black hair. She has an average build, with a C-cup chest. She doesn’t have a strong interest in the occult, but is bored enough to give the store’s inventory a look. She very quickly gets far more excitement that she ever wanted.

Rules: This is an ENF/ENM story. No death or gore, No incest or rape, No Scat or Vore. Shrinking/Growing is only allowed in the section specified for it, and no going crazy; the size change is temporary, no one is growing bigger than a house, and no one is shrinking smaller than a mouse. Obviously there’s going to be nudity/sexual situations, but let’s not get actual sex in here. Finally, the introduction/set-up chapters will be in second person perspective, but once Daniel or Vanessa is selected, the story will be in third person.
